snippet: Beats has been slow to reveal its plans for its new music service Daisy, but two recently announced hires should signal to Spotify, Rhapsody and others that Beats is serious about challenging them.
abstract: Beats has been slow to reveal its plans for its new music service Daisy, but two recently announced hires should signal to Spotify, Rhapsody and others that Beats is serious about challenging them.

headline.main: With 'Daisy,' Beats Electronics Bets on Digital Music
